reviewText: Unable to play DVD not formatted for all my players.  Suggest that you not sell this product in US or suggest the right type of player for this format.
Different but the same as ours in the USA. Same format not as violent with the police, laws are as bad as ours.
I could not play the DVD on DVD-TV system.  The TV indicated that the signal was blocked.  Also, series 4 is the same as season 2.  I discovered this when I played the DVD on my laptop computer.

I loved the tv series, and am looking forward to see4ing this series and all the others, Basil.
Thank You

I absolutely adored this series.  Every member of the cast is first rate.  The writing has that touch of Britain that makes the series far more appealing to me than the American counterpart.  I find Alesha's character as the most compelling, but everybody commands my full attention.  Excellent series.  Five stars easily.

I was angry when I viewed this DVD and found out that it was the same as season 2 and season 3 was the same as season 1 of which I all ready have. The cost and trouble of sending them back is far greater than just chucking them into the trash where they belong.
Great to see the differences between US and UK Justice system. Also fun to see Jamie Bamber
This isn't a season like I thought it's just part of a season I already have. I wasn't very happy to find this out after I received it ugh!!
I purchased a multi region dvd, and playback was no problem
why can't you make them for us players.  i would buy them all

I am partial to this series because of the police's sympathy to the affected. This is no longer true in some of our police actions in the US with Ferguson, Baltimore and other cities suffering extreme examples of misunderstanding and such force that people are killed before meaningful conversations can be started.
Series 4 is Season 2. DVD was Region 5 and would NOT play!
Still have not received but if it is like #3 it will be the wrong region and can not be played on a dvd player made in the USA

Great fun TV show.. But they messed it up.. Season 1 & 2 have SDH on them...For the hard of hearing...
Now they have got cheap.. Took it off..
